message: Let's split fairly, I'll take a bit more
My turn! This offer is better for both of us in the long run. Think carefully!
I'll take a bit less, but still more than half. Come on!
This is getting ridiculous!  I'm being more than fair, accept before inflation eats away at your potential gains!
I'll meet you in the middle of our last offers. Last chance before I take a big hit!
Fine. This is as low as I'm going. Take it or leave it. It's more than fair at this point.
